alert.note: Alert for Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 28 at 5:28AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...Wintry Weather Advisory for Wednesday and Significant Storm Friday... A Winter Weather Advisory was issued for the expected 3 to 6 inches of snow on Wednesday. Please see the appropriate product for further details. The advisory is just a precursor event as strong looking storm approaches. A strong system is expected to move over the entire Panhandle Friday before moving out on Saturday. This system may produce 6 to 12 inches of snow by New Years Day. Behind this system very cold air will move in for next week with near record breaking low temperatures along with strong outflow winds. Please stay tuned to www.weather.gov, NOAA Weather radio, or your favorite local weather news source for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Inner Channels from Kupreanof Island to Etolin Island; Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island
